meanings.definition: Relating to the study of airborne particles, such as pollen or spores.
meanings.sent1: The aerobiological research focused on analyzing pollen in the air.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use aerobiological techniques to monitor spore levels in different environments.
meanings.sent3: The aerobiological investigation into floating pollen revealed surprising patterns.
meanings.sent4: Her aerobiological expertise allowed her to predict the spore distribution accurately.
meanings.sent5: The aerobiological data painted a clear picture of pollen dispersion.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the biological aspects of the atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The aerobiological changes in the atmosphere affected plant growth.
meanings.sent2: Researchers study aerobiological factors to understand atmospheric dynamics.
meanings.sent3: The aerobiological quirks of the atmosphere kept the scientists intrigued.
meanings.sent4: His aerobiological perspective on the atmosphere revealed new insights.
meanings.sent5: The aerobiological nature of the atmosphere influenced ecosystem interactions.
